svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Transparency Accountability Index vs. Share of people paying bribes, 2010
The vertical axis shows scores in the Transparency Accountability Index (2010 data, lower values reflect less
accountability, e.g. weaker fiscal transparency and political constraints). The horizontal axis shows the percentage of
people who report having paid a bribe to access public services in the last year (2013 data). Colors reflect world
Share of people who have bribed in 2013
Source: Transparency International - GCB 2013, Williams Andrew (2014) via the Quality of Government dataset
